Bahrain Head of the Legal Affairs Division of the General Directorate of Traffic reinforce e-services social distancing - April 7
On April 28 in Bahrain, it was announced that the Southern Governorate Police Directorate carried out social distancing safety procedures, among 147 steps of enforcement.

On April 28 in Bahrain, the Muharraq Governorate Police Directorate has taken 86 steps in law enforcement procedures to promote social distancing for groups of more than 5 persons in cooperation with the Operations Room from March 22.

On April 28th, in Bahrain, the Capital Governorate Police Directorate has taken 167 steps to promote social distancing for groups of more than 5 persons (in cooperation with the Operations Room from March 22.)
